RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 5F Turf CR: 58. Maiden Claiming Purse 18000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHE'S MY LOUIE V. broke back, moved up race in mid pack off the inside, closer three wide late in the turn, challenged on the outside nearing midstretch, drifted out, drew clear under steady handling. DEBBO dueled early outside the winner, fell back off that one turning for home, proved determined in the late going for the place. HIDDEN LOVE back off the pace and the inside, dropped to the rail approaching midstretch, finished willingly up the inside earn the show. NATURALBORNSENDER dueled early inside, edged clear late in the turn, offered brief resistance to that one when challenged upper stretch, began to falter when headed. PINTORA went one paced, lacked a closing kick. HIGH DONNA within striking distance while racing outside, tired. BOSTON PAULETTE broke back and never menaced. DOWNTOWN PORTER last away then steadied, also remained back to be always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Naturalbornsender
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early inside, larger lead late turn, faltered when headed

ENTRY.NAME: Downtown Porter
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, steadied, always outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Hidden Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, moved inside, willingly 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Pintora
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced, lacked closing kick

ENTRY.NAME: Debbo
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early off the inside, determined 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: She's My Louie V.
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk back, moved up to mid pack,3w into lane,bid, drift,drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Boston Paulette
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, never menaced

ENTRY.NAME: High Donna
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance early outside, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 84. Allowance Purse 32000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 16, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden And Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIFE IS A BANQUET broke out but on top, showed the way out of the chute toward the inside, continued to set the pace into the turn, shrugged off the runner up when straightened for home, drew out while being kept to task. BILOXI in mid pack early, moved closest to the winner late in the turn, saw that progress stall in upper stretch while drifting out, proved no match for that same foe the final furlong, remained clear of the others. MOTAWAAFEQ chased the winner from along the inside, also proved no match in the drive, saved the show. LULOS in the main group while outside up the backstretch, four wide into the turn, three wide exiting, went evenly through the lane in lacking a closing response. ASHAAB off a step slow, trailed early as a result, was four wide out of the turn, made little impact in the run to the wire. MUSTAFA broke out, faded through the stretch, trailed home.

ENTRY.NAME: Motawaafeq
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, saved show

ENTRY.NAME: Biloxi
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, closer turn, flattened out while drifting, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Life Is a Banquet
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, early pace, shrugged off foe, drew out,kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: Mustafa
ENTRY.OWNER: Highfield Investment Group Inc and Appleyard Greg
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, faded stretch, trailed home

ENTRY.NAME: Ashaab
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, trailed, four wide exiting turn, little impact

ENTRY.NAME: Lulos
ENTRY.COMMENT: main body outside, 4w into turn, evenly drive

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 5F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 11500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JUNE 16, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 16, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MUCHO MARVIN bumped with MINISTER'S MEDAL at the break, raced back early as a result, made a quick five wide move into contention late in the turn, challenged the leader past the furlong marker, edged clear under steady handling. WAR SONG with the pace up the backstretch while between foes, showed the way through the turn just off the inside, continued to hold the advantage upper stretch, responded and raced on equal terms with the winner inside the furlong marker, relinquished to that one late, held the place. BAYOU BEAUX last away, lacked early foot, came four to five wide out of the turn, raced widest through the stretch, finished willingly to be getting to the runner up late. GENIUS broke back, lacked speed, rallied through traffic and was also going well at the end. QUEST FOR AVETTE with the early pace inside, shuffled back into the turn, improved position while continuing along the rail into the stretch, flattened out the final furlong to lose a couple of positions. B B MOODY vied up front while three wide, fell back through the turn, no menace stretch. MINISTER'S MEDAL bumped with the winner at the break, recovered to contest the pace while four wide and between horses up the backstretch, weakened after four furlongs. WYOMING CONQUEST with the pace while widest in the run up the backstretch, five wide into the turn, also backed up after a half. BLUSHINSTREETDEVIL fell back to trail after the start, was never a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Genius
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, lacked speed, rallied through traffic

ENTRY.NAME: Blushinstreetdevil
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Bayou Beaux
ENTRY.OWNER: Gillis, Betty J. and Joseph A.
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, lacked speed, 4-5w 1/4, widest drive, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Quest for Avette
ENTRY.COMMENT: with early pace inside, shuffled 7/16, closer inside, flattened

ENTRY.NAME: War Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: with pace btwn foes, showed way into lane, held 2nd late

ENTRY.NAME: B B Moody
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied three wide, fell back turn, no menace stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Mucho Marvin
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump brk, back, 5w move into lane, bid, kicked clear

ENTRY.NAME: Minister's Medal
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump break, vied 4w early, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Wyoming Conquest
ENTRY.COMMENT: with pace 5w into turn, backed up

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 1M Turf CR: 85. Claiming Purse 19500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 16, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 16, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs . Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances). (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPELLBINDING in the second flight early while between horses, moved closer second turn, dueled into the lane on the outside, got out a bit in upper straight, was righted, edged away the final furlong under steady handling. WORLD WAR away in good order, alternated up front for five furlongs off the inside, shook off the other speed far turn, was joined by the winner soon after, raced on equal terms with that into and through upper stretch, gave ground stubbornly until late, remained clear of the others. MY LITTLE JEN in the second flight early, fell back the middle half, two path into the lane, late run to be getting to the runner up late. BEAUTIFUL ENDING broke back, void of speed for five furlongs, angled out four wide turning for home, staged a mild rally while widest down the lane. GATOR PROUD broke back, trailed most the the way, picked off a couple of tiring rivals after the issue had been decided. GLANCE reluctant to load, settled in mid pack, had little for the drive. EXACTA broke on top, helped set those quick early fractions, gave way far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Exacta
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, quick duel inside, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: My Little Jen
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight early, fell back, gaining 2nd late

ENTRY.NAME: Gator Proud
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, trailed, passed couple of tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: World War
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick duel 2p, stubborn til late

ENTRY.NAME: Beautiful Ending
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back,lacked speed, angled 4w late 2nd turn, mild rally

ENTRY.NAME: Spellbinding
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight btwn foes, closer second turn, bid, came out 3/16, clr

ENTRY.NAME: Glance
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: reluctant to load, mid pack, had little for drive

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 5F Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Special Weight Purse 34000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SARAH'S COURT forwardly placed early while three wide, fell back a bit off the two leaders late in the turn and into the stretch, set down, late surge to be up in time outside that same pair of rivals at the wire. TAP GALORE moved up to contest the pace along the inside up the backstretch, dueled out of the turn and through the stretch, held the advantage late,nailed in the final strides by the winner. CRUSIN LIKE A CAT away in good order, vied early outside the running up dueled with that one through the latter portion of the turn and through the stretch, weakened between that same foe and the winner late. CUSTOM SUNSHINE back off the early pace, moved closer four wide turning for home, flattened out the final furlong to post no threat to the top three. EMILYHASHERTURN in mid pack outside, raced five out to six wide out of the turn, lacked a closing kick as well. HART'S PRETTY GIRL void of speed, moved well outside, five wide into the stretch, improved position with some belated interest. LONG LEGGED LADY in the second flight well wide, five path into the lane, tired in the run to the wire. CAJUN ROCK STAR broke on top, with the early pace, shuffled back from between foes into the turn, continued to fade. ONE LINE RULER broke back, moved up in some traffic early, had little for the drive. ZOSIAS SHIP fell back soon after the start and was not a factor. BELLAMYSAWESOMEDAY broke inward and a step slow, trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Tap Galore
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up to contest pace, dueled into stretch, nailed late

ENTRY.NAME: Zosias Ship
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Rock Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, vied, shuffled 7/16, faded

ENTRY.NAME: One Line Ruler
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, moved up in traffic, little left

ENTRY.NAME: Hart's Pretty Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, 5w into stretch, improved late

ENTRY.NAME: Bellamysawesomeday
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke inward and a step slow, trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Custom Sunshine
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J and Our Blue Streaks Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the early pace, closer 4w late turn, flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Crusin Like a Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: away in good order, vied, dueled, weakened late btwn top two

ENTRY.NAME: Long Legged Lady
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J Our Blue Streaks Stable and Pomier Chasey Deville
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight outside, 5w into lane, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Emilyhasherturn
ENTRY.OWNER: Friends of Racing Club LLC and Cleek Phillip
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack outside, 5-6w turn, no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Sarah's Court
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward early, 3w turn, late surge outside, in time

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 1M Turf CR: 78. Claiming Purse 16000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 16, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500, if for $10,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: US SECOND CUTE PIE unhurried early while clear along the inside, continued to patiently handled into the far turn, called on for some run with just over a quarter remaining, swung out five wide into the lane, late bid outside, up in time. COINMAKER forwardly placed from the start, closer before a half, ranged up and took over late in the final turn, clear a furlong out, could not contain the winner. SERIOUSLY SAM settled behind a moderate pace, picked up the tempo while three to four wide into the lane, proved no match for the top two late, clear of the rest. IRON BANNER worked way clear before a quarter, showed the way up the backstretch, continued to hold the advantage into the far turn, began to weaken when headed by the runner up soon after. PSEUDOSCIENCE in the second group between horses past the wire the first time, continued off the pace, four wide into the lane, remained one paced to the wire. BARBIE WARS chased the early leader, moved on that one between foes and inside the runner up while between horses second turn, weakened down the stretch. MSCHITCHATTOUR bumped and bothered at the break to be last away, remained back in failing to rally. FLASHYBOY'S LILSIS broke out, bumped foe, failed to menace. SUGAR STAR broke back and was never a factor. CAJUN TWO STEP mid pack, began to fade after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Us Second Cute Pie
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried inside, swung 5w into lane, late bid outside,determined

ENTRY.NAME: Flashyboy's Lilsis
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, bumped foe, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Mschitchattour
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, bothered break, back, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Seriously Sam
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, 3-4w into lane, no match top two late

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Two Step
ENTRY.COMMENT: began to fade after a half

ENTRY.NAME: Sugar Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back and was never a factor

ENTRY.NAME: Pseudoscience
ENTRY.COMMENT: went one paced out in the course

ENTRY.NAME: Coinmaker
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, outside bid, shook clear, caught late

ENTRY.NAME: Barbie Wars
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, brief bid second turn, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Iron Banner
ENTRY.COMMENT: worked way clear before a quarter, pace,weakened when headed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 7F Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 10000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE DECEMBER 16, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JUNE 16, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 16, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A R ace At A Mile Or Over Since April 16, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ISOLATION close from the start out in the strip, moved on the winner and took over late in the turn, shook clear by the time she was straightened for home, held the runner up comfortably at bay the final furlong under steady handlng. PEACEFUL VISION forwardly placed in the two path and inside the winner, asked along turn but failed to keep up with that entering the stretch, chased past the furlong marker, modest late gain on that same rival while clearly second best. COUNTRY DREAM lacked early foot, came five wide for the drive, proved no match for the top two to the wire, held sway for the show. YOUNMEHONEYBUNNY broke on top, cleared toward the inside early, continued to show the way into the turn, offered but brief resistance to the winner midway on the bend then began to weaken when headed. GEE GEE forwardly placed out of the chute inside, fell back before a half, went evenly through the stretch. CAJUN SHOTS broke back, void of early foot, moved out a bit for room past the furlong marker then displayed a modest amount of late interest. BE A BANDIT in the second flight outside, four wide into the stretch, had little for the run to the wire. KEHRON'S CREED in mid pack, backed up while racing in the three path. MISSGREELEY'SSONG last away, trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Gee Gee
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance early, fell back, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Shots
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, moved out drive, modest late interest

ENTRY.NAME: Kehron's Creed
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, backed up three wide

ENTRY.NAME: Missgreeley'ssong
ENTRY.COMMENT: last to leave, trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Younmehoneybunny
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, cleared and set early pace, weakened stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Peaceful Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward 2p, fell back off winner, asked turn, 3w,modest late gain

ENTRY.NAME: Country Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, five wide into lane, no match top two

ENTRY.NAME: Be a Bandit
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight outside, 4w into stretch, little left

ENTRY.NAME: Isolation
ENTRY.COMMENT: close from start, outside bid turn, shook clear, held

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Jason Hall, BCS Thoroughbreds, andLouis J. Eymard II

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Purse 35000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 16, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A R ace Since April 16, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ANDIAMO GIACOMO broke well, fell back off the issue while racing outside, came five wide for the drive, set down, challenged outside the leader with a sixteenth remaining and edged clear. CUSTOM BOBBY'S behind the lead pack outside, stalked those leaders four wide through the turn, called on for some run into the lane, challenged and took over with less than a furlong remaining, could not contain the winner late while inside that one. SADIE'S LIGHT in mid pack while racing off the inside, evenly paced past the midstretch point, late rally to be up for the show. HUFFS TAZ A BOO last to leave, void of speed for three furlongs, was six wide exiting the turn, staged a mild rally to improve position. FREE FROM GUILT lacked speed after breaking near the rear, angled out to be five wide into the lane,improved position by passing tiring rivals. CHARLI MICHAEL vied up front while three wide, continued to hold a narrow margin past the furlong marker then gave way. LION HEART LEGEND set or forced the early pace along the inside and gave way. ADIEU ACES with the pace between foes early, dueled along the inside late turn, backed up through the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Lion Heart Legend
ENTRY.COMMENT: set or forced early pace inside, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Sadie's Light
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack off rail, rallied, up late show

ENTRY.NAME: Adieu Aces
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied between foes, dueled late turn, backed up stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Free From Guilt
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald and Pomier Chasey Deville
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 5w into lane, passed tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Charli Michael
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied up front 3w, gave way late

ENTRY.NAME: Andiamo Giacomo
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well, fell back outside, 5w into lane, bid, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Huffs Taz a Boo
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, void of speed, 6w into lane, mild rally

ENTRY.NAME: Custom Bobby's
ENTRY.OWNER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind lead pack outside, 4w turn, took over, outkicked late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 5F Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Special Weight Purse 34000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DAT GUITAR in mid pack early while racing outside, rallied three wide out of the turn, closed with good energy to win going away at the end. TONI'S M broke outward but with the leaders, stalked that pair into the turn in the three path, challenged energy the stretch, vied late between foes and inside the winner, proved no match in the final strides, clear for the place. REQUITE THE EFFORT broke alertly, dueled early in the two path, disposed of the other speed by late in the turn, briefly responded when challenged by the runner up past the furlong marker then could not keep up, saved the show. SHOOTING STICK lacked speed, four wide exiting the turn, staged a mild rally to improve a bit, not a threat to the top three. CHUCHI had a one paced effort while racing off the inside. REMEMBERIN RONALD also went evenly in lacking a rally. TOP CON fell back to trail after the start, passed some tiring rivals after the issue had been decided. QUEEN'S SOLDIER broke back and was not a factor. KRAZY KATIE dueled early along the inside, began to give way before three furlongs. VEGAS ON MY MIND was finished early, trailed home.

ENTRY.NAME: Vegas On My Mind
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early, trailed home

ENTRY.NAME: Rememberin Ronald
ENTRY.COMMENT: even effort in lacking a rally

ENTRY.NAME: Shooting Stick
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 4w into the lane, mild rally

ENTRY.NAME: Chuchi
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced off rail

ENTRY.NAME: Krazy Katie
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early inside, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Requite the Effort
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, dueled 2p, weakened, saved show

ENTRY.NAME: Queen's Soldier
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back and was not a factor

ENTRY.NAME: Dat Guitar
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack outside, roused 3w into lane, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Top Con
ENTRY.OWNER: GM Assets LLC and Meche Shane
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, passed tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Toni's M
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, bid, vied btwn late, no match
